department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Contract to Supply furnishing the 7th floor, 605 Robson Street Vancouver
full_summary:
=====================================================

### [Identification of the Call for Tenders]

#### Notice to Tender

*   **Call for Procurement ID:** EZ899-222479
*   **Language:** English
*   **French:** APK899-222479 - Mobilier de bureau
*   **Publication Date:** 2022-09-29
*   **Service Canada Public Works and Government Services Contracting Agency:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Call for Tender Details

*   **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
*   **Procurement Category:** Goods
*   **Procurement Method:** Selective Tendering

#### callOfTendersInformation 

*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) Against Supply Agreement
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, etc.

#### Project and Country Details

*   **Region of Opportunity:** British Columbia
*   **Region of Delivery:** British Columbia
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** 2023-02-28

#### Professional Services

*   **Notice to Prospective Designated Supplier**
	+   The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has selected this supply agreement to acquire office furniture items to meet the required needs to be delivered to the Bank of Canada placement at at 7th floor, 605 Robson Street, Vancouver BC.

#### Drawings, Specifications and Additional Documents

*   **Availability:**
	+   Ariba Discovery (link) [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14242402?extsite=MTQyNDI0MDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==]

#### Closing Date, Time, and the Determination of the Bidder

*   **Public Notice to Tender:** 2022-10-31T14:00:00
*   **Notice of Result:** The proposals will be evaluated based on lowest weighted price

### Points of Contact

*   **Commercial Contact Person:** Locke, Kelsey (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email:** kelsey.locke@tpsg
